post.description:
RiskOS™ sends an HTTP `POST` request to your endpoint when an event occurs, 
with the payload structure determined by the `event_type` field.

200.description: Webhook received successfully. RiskOS™ expects a `200` response to confirm receipt.

400.description: Bad Request – The request was invalid or cannot be otherwise served.

500.description: Internal Server Error – An unexpected condition occurred on the server.

DecisionUpdateWebhook.description: Triggered when a reviewer makes a decision change in Case Management.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

eval_id.description: RiskOS™-generated unique ID for the evaluation.

decision_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the decision was made.

reason_codes.description: Reason codes associated with the decision.

notes.description: Notes associated with the decision update (Optional).

attachments.description: Names of the attachments added with the decision update (Optional).

environment_name.description: Environment in which the event occurred.

ReviewCaseAssignedWebhook.description: Triggered when a case is assigned to a reviewer in Case Management.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

workflow.description: Workflow name corresponding to the evaluation use-case.

eval_id.description: RiskOS™ generated unique ID for the evaluation.

reviewer_id.description: Email ID of the reviewer to whom the case is assigned.

queue_name.description: Name of the review queue from which the case assignment is performed.

updated_at.description: RFC 3339 date-time string at which the case assignment is performed.

updated_by.description: Email ID of the reviewer by whom the case assignment is performed.

environment_name.description: Environment in which the event occurred.

ReviewCaseUnassignedWebhook.description: Triggered when a case is unassigned from a reviewer in Case Management.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

workflow.description: Workflow name corresponding to the evaluation use-case.

eval_id.description: RiskOS™ generated unique ID for the evaluation.

reviewer_id.description: Email ID of the reviewer from whom the case is unassigned.

queue_name.description: Name of the review queue from which the case unassignment is performed.

updated_at.description: RFC 3339 date-time string at which the case unassignment is performed.

updated_by.description: Email ID of the reviewer by whom the case unassignment is performed.

environment_name.description: Environment in which the event occurred.

CaseStatusUpdatedWebhook.description: Triggered when a case status is updated in Case Management.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

workflow.description: Workflow name corresponding to the evaluation use-case.

eval_id.description: RiskOS™ generated unique ID for the evaluation.

reviewer_id.description: Email ID of the reviewer of the case.

decision.description: Decision associated with the status change.

decision_at.description: RFC 3339 date-time string at which the decision was taken.

status.description: The new status of the case.

sub_status.description: The new sub-status of the case.

updated_at.description: RFC 3339 date-time string at which the status update occurred.

decision_queue.description: Name of the review queue from which the decision was taken.

environment_name.description: Environment in which the event occurred.

reason_codes.description: Reason codes for the status update.

notes.description: Notes associated with the status update.

attachments.description: Names of the attachments added with the status update.

CaseNotesAddedWebhook.description: Triggered when notes are added to a case in Case Management.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

workflow.description: Workflow name corresponding to the evaluation use-case.

eval_id.description: RiskOS™ generated unique ID for the evaluation.

reviewer_id.description: Email ID of the reviewer from whom the case is unassigned.

updated_at.description: RFC 3339 date-time string at which the case unassignment is performed.

notes.description: The text content of the note or comment added by the reviewer.

environment_name.description: Environment in which the event occurred.

attachments.description: Names of the attachments included with the note.

CaseAttachmentAddedWebhook.description: Triggered when attachments are added to a case in Case Management.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

workflow.description: Workflow name corresponding to the evaluation use-case.

eval_id.description: RiskOS™ generated unique ID for the evaluation.

reviewer_id.description: Email ID of the reviewer of the case.

updated_at.description: RFC 3339 date-time string at which the status update was performed.

environment_name.description: Environment in which the event occurred.

attachments.description: Names of the attachments added with the status update.

FraudConfirmedWebhook.description: Triggered when a case is marked as fraud or non-fraud in Case Management.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

workflow.description: Workflow name corresponding to the evaluation use-case.

notes.description: Additional notes to be added when marking a case as `fraud` or `non-fraud` (Optional).

tags.description: Tags associated with the fraud confirmation (Optional).

recorded_by.description: Fraud response team member who recorded the fraud at the customer end (Optional).

environment_name.description: Environment in which the event occurred.

recorded_at.description: RFC 3339 date-time string when the fraud feedback was recorded at the customer end (Optional).

created_by.description: Fraud response team member who recorded the fraud in RiskOS™.

created_at.description: RFC 3339 date-time string when the fraud feedback was created in RiskOS™.

EvaluationCompletedWebhook.description:
Triggered when any of the following occur:
        
        * An **asynchronous evaluation** finishes processing.
        * A **manually created case** completes processing.
        * **Document Verification (DocV)** completes.
        * Any **paused evaluation** resumes and completes.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

workflow.description: Workflow name corresponding to the evaluation use-case.

workflow_version.description: Version number of the executed workflow.

eval_end_time.description: RFC 3339 timestamp indicating when the evaluation completed.

eval_id.description: RiskOS™-generated unique ID for the evaluation.

eval_start_time.description: RFC 3339 timestamp indicating when the evaluation started.

decision.description: Final decision outcome (e.g., APPROVE, DECLINE, REVIEW).

decision_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the decision was finalized.

score.description: Risk score associated with the evaluation (0–100, if available).

environment_name.description: Environment in which the evaluation was performed.

eval_source.description: Source of the evaluation (e.g., API, Manual, Rerun).

notes.description: Additional notes related to the evaluation (Optional).

review_queues.description: Names of the review queues assigned to the evaluation.

data_enrichments.description: Third-party data enrichment results linked to the evaluation.

request.description: The request payload sent to the third-party provider (Dynamic keys/values).

response.description: The response payload received from the third-party provider (Dynamic keys/values).

EvaluationPausedWebhook.description:
Triggered when any of the following occur:
        
        * An **asynchronous evaluation** needs additional input (e.g., One-Time Passcode verification).
        * **Predictive Document Verification** is waiting for the user to upload documents.
        * A **workflow** requires manual intervention before proceeding.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

workflow.description: Workflow name corresponding to the evaluation use-case.

workflow_version.description: Version number of the executed workflow.

environment_name.description: Environment in which the evaluation was performed.

eval_end_time.description: RFC 3339 timestamp indicating when the evaluation was paused.

eval_id.description: RiskOS™-generated unique ID for the evaluation.

eval_start_time.description: RFC 3339 timestamp indicating when the evaluation started.

decision.description: Current decision state for the evaluation.

decision_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the current decision was made.

notes.description: Additional notes related to the evaluation (Optional).

review_queues.description: Names of the review queues assigned to the evaluation.

data_enrichments.description: Data enrichment results available for the evaluation.

request.description: The request payload sent to the provider.

response.description: The response payload received from the provider.

ReevaluationWebhook.description:
Triggered when any of the following occur:
        
        * A case is **manually rerun** from Case Management.
        * **Workflow rules** are updated and cases need re-processing.
        * **Additional data** becomes available and the case needs a fresh evaluation.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

workflow.description: Workflow name corresponding to the evaluation use-case.

workflow_version.description: Version number of the executed workflow.

eval_id.description: RiskOS™-generated unique ID for the evaluation.

eval_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp of the evaluation time (used in older event versions).

decision_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the decision was finalized.

eval_source.description: Source of the evaluation (must be 'Rerun' for this event type).

notes.description: Additional notes related to the evaluation (Optional).

review_queues.description: Names of the review queues assigned to the evaluation.

data_enrichments.description: Data enrichment results available for the evaluation.

request.description: The request payload sent to the provider.

response.description: The response payload received from the provider.

WorkflowExecutionFailedWebhook.description: Triggered when an evaluation fails to execute due to errors.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event.

event_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the event was created.

id.description: Customer provided identifier for the evaluation event.

workflow.description: Workflow name corresponding to the evaluation use-case.

eval_id.description: RiskOS™ generated unique ID for the evaluation.

workflow_version.description: Version number associated with the executed workflow.

timestamp.description: RFC 3339 date-time string received in the request payload.

host.description: Internal host that handled the evaluation.

error_message.description: Error message describing the reason for the failure.
